record.title: MEASURE PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--S. 574

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I know there are Senators wishing to speak, but I just want to say a few more words on a different subject. First of all, S. 574 is at the desk and due for a second reading.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bill by title for a second time.

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I object to any further proceedings with respect to this bill.

record.chair: Objection is heard. The bill will be placed on the calendar.
record.narrative: (The remarks of Mr. Reid pertaining to the introduction of S. 579 and S. 588 are located in today's Record under "Statements on Introduced bills and Joint Resolutions.")
